title: 不同弓射出不同效果
txt_content:
视频：http://player.youku.com/player.php/sid/XODgwNzc1MTg4/v.swf
视频中的指令:
指令：




2015-01-28_13.52.20.png (74.06 KB, 下载次数: 46)

下载附件

2015-1-28 14:13 上传




summon FallingSand ~ ~1 ~ {Tile:152}
指令来转载自：
PotatoMaster101




2015-01-28_13.52.14.png (197.55 KB, 下载次数: 48)

下载附件

2015-1-28 14:13 上传




第一排命令方块指令：
testfor @p {SelectedItemSlot:0,Inventory:[{id:minecraft:bow,Count:1b,Slot:0b,Damage:0s,tag:{display:{Name:"末影弓"}}}]}
/testfor @p {Inventory:[{Slot:1b,id:minecraft:bow,Damage:0s,Count:1b,tag:{display:{Name:"岩浆弓"}}}]}
/testfor @p {Inventory:[{Slot:2b,id:minecraft:bow,Damage:0s,Count:1b,tag:{display:{Name:"爆炸弓"}}}]}
/testfor @p {Inventory:[{Slot:3b,id:minecraft:bow,Damage:0s,Count:1b,tag:{display:{Name:"雷电弓"}}}]}
比较基础，就是探测，不解释。




2015-01-28_13.52.53.png (223.8 KB, 下载次数: 50)

下载附件

2015-1-28 14:13 上传





所有比较器后面的指令都是:testfor @e[type=Arrow] {inGround:1b}




2015-01-28_13.53.01.png (213.05 KB, 下载次数: 46)

下载附件

2015-1-28 14:13 上传





比较器前面从左到右（不包括最后一个）是:
execute @e[type=Arrow] ~ ~ ~ summon LightningBolt ~ ~ ~   
雷电弓
execute @e[type=Arrow] ~ ~ ~ summon PrimedTnt ~ ~ ~    
爆炸弓
execute @e[type=Arrow] ~ ~ ~ fill ~1 ~ ~1 ~-1 ~ ~-1 lava    
岩浆弓
tp @p @e[type=Arrow]     
末影弓   
最后面所有的命令方块指令是：kill @e[type=Arrow]             
清除?(箭)不太想要继续发下去了=。=  能砸金粒吗？

replies.author: pca006132
replies.txt_content:
本帖最后由 pca006132 于 2015-1-30 21:04 编辑 
1425113841 发表于 2015-1-30 17:55
表示不会=。=  求教~
比如
先加一個timer比arrow
/scoreboard objectives add Timer dummy Timer
/scoreboard players add @e[type=Arrow] Timer 1
_________________________________________________________
再探測
/scoreboard objectives add selectedSlot dummy selectedSlot
/scoreboard players set @a selectedSlot 1 {SelectedItemSlot:0,Inventory:[{id:minecraft:bow,Count:1b,Slot:0b,Damage:0s,tag:{display:{Name:"末影弓"}}}]}
/scoreboard players set @a selectedSlot 2 {Inventory:[{Slot:1b,id:minecraft:bow,Damage:0s,Count:1b,tag:{display:{Name:"岩浆弓"}}}]}
...
再把arrow分類(依照你選擇的slot)
/scoreboard objectives add arrowType dummy arrowType
/execute @a[score_selectedSlot_min=1,score_selectedSlot=1] ~ ~ ~ /scoreboard players set @e[type=Arrow,score_Timer=3,r=3] arrowType 1
...
testfor 它是否在地上
/scoreboard players set @e[score_arrowType_min=1,score_arrowType=1] 11 {inGround:1b}
...
最後做效果
execute @e[type=Arrow,score_arrowType=11,score_arrowType_min=11] ~ ~ ~ summon LightningBolt ~ ~ ~   
....
/kill @e[type=Arrow,score_arrowType=11,score_arrowType_min=11]
(我有可能打錯{:10_503:})
如此類推,這個的不好處是可能有點lag,但它可以在多人遊戲裡玩

replies.author: pca006132
replies.txt_content:
1425113841 发表于 2015-1-30 20:43
這會很長...

/scoreboard objectives add Timer dummy Timer
首先,我加了一個記分板對象叫"Timer",只受命令影響

/scoreboard players add @e[type=Arrow] Timer 1
每一支箭,我都為它每1/20秒加了1分在"Timer",因為我要知道它的存在時間

/scoreboard objectives add selectedSlot dummy selectedSlot
我加了一個記分板對象叫"selectedSlot",只受命令影響

/scoreboard players set @a selectedSlot 1 {SelectedItemSlot:0,Inventory:[{id:minecraft:bow,Count:1b,Slot:0b,Damage:0s,tag:{display:{Name:"末影弓"}}}]}
任何人的NBT tag 是 {SelectedItemSlot:0,Inventory:[{id:minecraft:bow,Count:1b,Slot:0b,Damage:0s,tag:{display:{Name:"末影弓"}}}]} 的話,它的"selectedSlot" 就會設為一分

/scoreboard objectives add arrowType dummy arrowType
我加了一個記分板對象叫"arrowType",只受命令影響

/execute @a[score_selectedSlot_min=1,score_selectedSlot=1] ~ ~ ~ /scoreboard players set @e[type=Arrow,score_Timer=3,r=3] arrowType 1
先看/execute @a[score_selectedSlot_min=1,score_selectedSlot=1] ~ ~ ~
每個"selectedSlot"分數為1的人就會執行以下命令
/scoreboard players set @e[type=Arrow,score_Timer=3,r=3] arrowType 1
每支在"selectedSlot"分數為1的人旁邊3格,存在時間少於0.15秒的箭,"arrowType" 的分數會加一分(以得知它是甚麼弓射出的)

/scoreboard players set @e[score_arrowType_min=1,score_arrowType=1] 11 {inGround:1b}
在地上而且"arrorType"分數為1的箭,"arrowType"的分數會變為11

execute @e[type=Arrow,score_arrowType=11,score_arrowType_min=11] ~ ~ ~ summon LightningBolt ~ ~ ~  
用那支箭生成一道雷電
/kill @e[type=Arrow,score_arrowType=11,score_arrowType_min=11]
同時delete 它

pca006132 发表于 2015-1-30 21:10
